definitions.title: adv.
definitions.body: downwards (from [[[מַט]]] for [[[מַטֶּה]]] a place of declension (cf. [[נׇטָה]],

definitions.title: l.
definitions.body: alone, De 28:43 and thou shalt descend [[מַ֫טָּה מָָ֫טָּה]] downwards, downwards, i.e. lower and lower, Pr 15:24 ´[[לְמַעַן סוּר מִשְּׁאוֹל מ]].

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: downwards De 28:13 ´[[וְלאׁ תִהְיֶה למ]], Is 37:31 = 2Ki 19:30 ´[[שׁׂרֶשׁ למ]] (cf. Ph CIS:1. i. 2, 11 f. [[אל יכן לם שׁרשׁ למט ופר למעל]] let them not have root downwards, or fruit upwards), Je 31:37, Ec 3:21, 2Ch 32:30; Ezr 9:13 [[כי אתה חָשַׂכְתָּ לְמַ֫טָּה מֵעֲוֹנֵנוּ]] either (Be) hast kept back, downward, part of our iniquity (prevented it from appearing, and being counted against us), or, held us (Ges), or thy anger (Ke), back, below (cf. [[לְמַ֫עְלָה מֵעַל]] above, 2Ch 34:4) our iniq. (punished us less than our iniq. deserved).

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: [[וּלְמַ֫טָּה]], (a) of space, and downwards, Ez Eze 1:27 ´[[וּמִמַּרְאֵה מָתְנׇיו ול]], Eze 8:2; (b) of age, and under, 1Ch 17:23 [[לְמִבֶּן עשׂרים]] ´[[שׁנה וְ]].
